main.name: Max Grier
main.description: I am currently working for Boeing Commercial Aiplanes.  I enjoy using my Computer Science experience to automate and improve processes
main.bio: I am a Pacific Northwest native originally from Gig Harbor, WA.  I enjoy deep diving into data and providing insights to drive improvements.  My passion is to create new tools and processes that simplify and automate tasks.  Outside of work, I enjoy traveling, yoga, cycling, and spending time at the beach.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

work.title: Financial Analyst
work.description: Developer on the ATC Speech Recognition project to create the metadata preprocessing pipeline through Google cloud and Docker containers which feeds the React front end in order to monitor server health.  Supporting the Director of Propulsion as well as 787 and 777x commercial airplanes to manage headcount, budget forecasts, analyze and interpret variances, and report findings to Leadership.  Coordinate with Project Managers, Engineers, and Senior Managers to ensure accurate resource and budget forecasts.  Extract and compile weekly, monthly, and quarterly financial performance reports for Executives and Senior Managers.  Responsible for maintaining $55 and $50 million in project funding for the Technology Integration and Advanced Materials portfolios, respectively.  Lead the development of standard reporting tools with COGNOS queries and compiled data with Power Query.  Finished the 2020 fiscal year with a 0.25% budget variance across the Advanced Materials portfolio

work.title: Junior bug fixer

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
